https://tmrev.io/movie/25422-Die You Zombie Bastards! 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pPJRM5NXnCkYnbDosCVYihSkr4I.jpg Red Toole is an average good-hearted serial killer who enjoys killing hippies almost as much as he loves his wife Violet. But when Violet is kidnapped Toole sets out to reclaim the woman he loves, with unusual and often hilarious results. Die You Zombie Bastards!
